pepper.framework.infra.config.local module¶

class pepper.framework.infra.config.local.LocalConfig(parser, section)[source]¶

Bases: pepper.framework.infra.config.api.Configuration

get(key, multi=False)[source]¶

Get a configuration value as String for the specified key.

Parameters

  • key (str) – The key for the configuration value to be retrieved.

  • multi (bool) – Retrieve a list of values if True, else a single value

Returns

The configuration value, or a list of value if multi is True

Return type

str or Iterable[str]

Raises

KeyError – If there is no value configured for the specified key.

get_boolean(key)[source]¶

A convenience method which coerces the configuration value for the specified key to a Boolean value. Note that the accepted values for the option are “1”, “yes”, “true”, and “on”, which cause this method to return True, and “0”, “no”, “false”, and “off”, which cause it to return False. These string values are checked in a case-insensitive manner. Any other value will cause it to raise ValueError.

Parameters

key (str) – The key for the configuration value to be retrieved.

Returns

The configuration value as boolean

Return type

bool

Raises

  • ValueError – If the requested value cannot be coerced into a boolean value.

  • KeyError – If there is no value configured for the provided key.

get_enum(key, type, multi=False)[source]¶

A convenience method which coerces the configuration value for the specified key to an enum.Enum instance.

Parameters

  • key (str) – The key for the configuration value to be retrieved.

  • type – The type of enum.Enum to be resolved from the configuration value.

  • multi (bool) – Retrieve a list of values if True

Returns

The configuration value as enum.Enum instance, or a list of values if multi is True

Return type

Enum or Iterable[Enum]

Raises

  • ValueError – If the requested value cannot be coerced into an Enum instance for the specified Enum type.

  • KeyError – If there is no value configured for the provided key.

get_float(key)[source]¶

A convenience method which coerces the configuration value for the specified key to a floating point number.

Parameters

key (str) – The key for the configuration value to be retrieved.

Returns

The configuration value as float

Return type

float

Raises

  • ValueError – If the requested value cannot be coerced into a floating point value.

  • KeyError – If there is no value configured for the provided key.

get_int(key)[source]¶

A convenience method which coerces the configuration value for the specified key to an integer.

Parameters

key (str) – The key for the configuration value to be retrieved

Returns

The configuration value as int

Return type

int

Raises

  • ValueError – If the requested value cannot be coerced into a int value.

  • KeyError – If there is no value configured for the specified key.

get_config(name, callback=None)[source]¶

Obtain the Configuration for the specified name.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name identifying the configuration.

  • callback (Callable[(Configuration), None]) – Callback function that is called on configuration changes.

Returns

The Configuration for the provided configuration name.

Return type

Configuration

Raises

ValueError – If there is not Configuration with the given name
